item.description: Dawei Ma's Resume Projects 2018.11 Coupon Web Project Description: A coupon information platform for overseas. Technology tags: Content management platform, high concurrent Web site, distributed crawler technology, SEO optimization technology, ELK, NLP, Coupon aff-network data integrated Development language: Java & Scala & PlayFramework & SpringBoot & Python & Elixir 2018.4 Digital Intercom App Project Description: The digital walkie-talkie can be connected via Bluetooth and related configuration information can be set, and the IM voice chat function is also available.
